A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It started out great. The middle of the movie (2nd Act) was pretty weak. I think they could’ve easily trimmed 20 mins off of it and still had the point/premise come across. (POSSIBLE SPOILERS) What’s up with the “Force FaceTime”? Really? Although\, seeing Kylo Ren shirtless...Woof. And remind me not to run low on gas with the First Order behind me. That was lame/weak story-writing. But overall\, I liked it and found it very thought-provoking as far as the purpose of “The Force” and many other themes (trying to avoid spoilers). The conclusion (3rd Act) saves it.
